inclusion.criterion: Subjects between the ages of 18 and 65
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of cluster headache as defined by the International Classification of Headache Disorders (2nd edition)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lifetime prevalence of at least 2 prior cluster cycles
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Experience one or more attacks/day during baseline period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Typical cluster period lasting at least 8 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject is in active cluster period and expected remaining duration of the cluster cycle is at least 8 weeks from Baseline visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject can differentiate other headache types from cluster headaches
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Female subject of child-bearing potential is using or agrees to use a medically acceptable form of contraception for the duration of participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subject of child-bearing potential has negative urine pregnancy test prior to study entry
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject can understand and comply with all study requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject provides written informed consent prior to any screening procedures being conducted
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with a history of significant drug or alcohol abuse within the past year
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old girl with recurrent bilateral headache. She has been diagnosed with migraine headache and is under treatment.
